    • Uses of LearningRate in burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.fourier

      Classes in burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.fourier that implement LearningRate 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FourierBasisLearningRateWrapper
      This LearningRate implementation provides a wrapper around a source LearningRate that should be used whenever using FourierBasis features with an algorithm like GradientDescentSarsaLam.
      Fields in burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.fourier declared as LearningRate 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected LearningRate FourierBasisLearningRateWrapper.sourceLearningRateFunction
      The source LearningRate function that is queried.
      Constructors in burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.fourier with parameters of type LearningRate 
      Constructor and Description
      FourierBasisLearningRateWrapper(LearningRate sourceLearningRateFunction, FourierBasis fouierBasisFunctions)
      Initializes.

    • Uses of LearningRate in burlap.behavior.learningrate

      Classes in burlap.behavior.learningrate that implement LearningRate 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantLR
      A class for specifying a constant learning rate that never changes.
      class  ExponentialDecayLR
      This class provides a learning rate that decays exponentially with time according to r^t, where r is in [0,1] and t is the time step, from an initial learning rate.
      class  SoftTimeInverseDecayLR
      Implements a learning rate decay schedule where the learning rate at time t is alpha_0 * (n_0 + 1) / (n_0 + t), where alpha_0 is the initial learning rate and n_0 is a parameter.
